entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Periods of snow beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023
